title: Bonus: Andy's Audiobook Exclusive
content:
Hope you enjoy this snippet from Andy's new book, A Beginner’s Guide to Breaking and Entering

You can find more information here: https://linktr.ee/AndrewHunterMurray

We'll be back next week (yes in seven days!) with some bonus bonus material that you won't want to miss!
